text: Nikolaos Morakis (, sometimes seen as Dorakis ()) was a Greek shooter. He competed at the 1896 Summer Olympics in Athens. Morakis competed in the military pistol event. He scored 205 points, finishing in third behind the American brothers John and Sumner Paine. title: Nikolaos Morakis
